name: The Insider: The Interactive Movie
storyline: A young woman has stolen secret information about an organization and aims to divulge it but realizes that she is being pursued, will she succeed in getting out of it? it's up to you to make the right choices for this to be the case.
summary: The Insider is an Interactive Movie FMV game. You will have to make a series of choices that will decide the fate of the character and how the story goes. The game has five different endings.
